snippet.title: Darkseed [Longplay] - DOS
snippet.description:
A very strange and enjoyable game.  Darkseed is one of those "What the hell do I do?" type of games where missing a event can deem the game unbeatable, as well as aimlessly walking around till night even though you already done everything for that day before 3pm.  Beside those flaws its art direction is highly praised and bizarre plot leading to the end somehow makes sense, unless I'm being mind controlled under the Ancients.

Anyways, Darkseed is one of the few games that spring to mind whenever I hear games where you can screw yourself over without knowing until you're stuck and have exhaust all available actions.
